message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price.  Could we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
